PAL.NAME: Microsoft OCS 2007 R2 - Archiving
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Performance counter thresholds for Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 R2 Archiving Server.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:Arch Service - 01 - READ Arch Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation

CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages that validation failed for.
